items.label: 539fb91aec4f024bc1dc1ecd
items.description:
Available to all consumers requiring less than 50kVA of transformer capacity at a single service location within the utility's service area. Special metering is required under this tariff and will be provided by the utility.
The "System Charge" covers costs of providing electric service, including operation and maintenance of facilities, consumer accounting expenses and other administrative costs. 

Purchased Power Cost Adjustment (PPCA) - The utility shall, if the purchased power expense is increased or decreased above or below the base purchased power cost of $0.07094/kWh sold, flow through to the users such increases or decreases, in accordance with New Mexico Public Regulation Commission Rule No. 550 and effective May 4, 2009. Click here to view the approved rate filing.
items.name: Time-Of-Use Rate
